personal.name: Omar AbdElzaher
personal.title: Senior Gameplay Engineer
personal.subtitle: Game Systems Architect
personal.about: Highly proficient Game Developer with over a decade of professional experience, specializing in Unity, multiplayer, and cross-platform game development, including VR/XR technologies. Expert in Unity DOTS, advanced game architecture design, and complex problem-solving.

description: Led the architecture team for the forthcoming metaverse initiative
Designed Unity DOTS-focused systems optimized for large-scale multiplayer
Built scalable networking and backend systems for MMO-level experiences
Owned cross-platform integration for web and VR targets
Built cross-platform web and VR experiences for a multiverse MMO
Implemented matchmaking, lobby, and real-time networking systems
Developed systems to handle NFT data integration
Led development team for serious games in cybersecurity awareness
Architected multi-platform Unity solutions (Web, VR, Kinect)
Mentored junior developers and established coding standards
Delivered enterprise training products for major clients
Taught C/C++, design patterns, Unity3D, HTML5 game dev, and optimization
Developed and updated curriculum to include latest industry tech
Guided students through graduation projects and production workflows
Rebuilt legacy Flash games for Web, Android, and iOS using Unity and Phaser.js
Developed server-side logic for multiplayer card and board games
Featured project: Estimation Kings (published on iOS & Android)
Developed SkyPM preventive maintenance software
Built web-based workflows for enterprise operations
Developed internal web portals and content systems

education.details: 9-month intensive game development program with focus on game programming, VR development, Unity3D, design patterns, and game optimization.

education.school: Misr Higher Institute for Engineering and Technology
education.details: Focus areas: software engineering, computer graphics, artificial intelligence, and systems architecture.

projects.name: ComfyUI Quality of Life Suit
projects.shortDescription: Popular ComfyUI extension with 176+ GitHub stars providing quality of life improvements for AI image generation workflows.
projects.description: A comprehensive suite of custom nodes for ComfyUI that enhances the AI image generation workflow. Features include prompt enhancement, workflow utilities, and community-driven improvements.

projects.name: HighStreet Metaverse
projects.shortDescription: MMO metaverse platform with cross-platform web and VR support. Led architecture and systems design for large-scale multiplayer.
projects.description: Led the architecture team for HighStreet's metaverse initiative. Designed and implemented networking infrastructure, matchmaking, and backend systems to support MMO-scale experiences. Built Unity DOTS-focused systems optimized for performance and cross-platform delivery.

projects.name: Omar Game Server
projects.shortDescription: Socket.io-based real-time multiplayer game server with room management and user handling.
projects.description: A scalable game server built with Node.js and Socket.io, supporting real-time multiplayer games with room management, user handling, and seamless client-server communication.

projects.name: Online Game Socket.io
projects.shortDescription: Real-time multiplayer game framework with Unity client integration and authoritative server architecture.
projects.description: A complete multiplayer framework featuring Unity client integration with Socket.io server. Includes examples of real-time synchronization, player interpolation, and authoritative server design.

projects.name: Unity Development Tools
projects.shortDescription: Professional Unity tools and frameworks including state machines, ScriptableObject systems, and UI optimization utilities.
projects.description: A collection of Unity development tools designed to streamline game workflows. Includes ScriptableObject architecture, state machines, events/variables, and performance-focused UI utilities.

subProjects.title: SO State Machine
subProjects.description: Scriptable Object-based state machine system with modular, debuggable game logic.

subProjects.title: SO Events & Variables
subProjects.description: Event-driven architecture system using Scriptable Objects for decoupled communication.

subProjects.title: SO System
subProjects.description: Comprehensive ScriptableObject framework for data-driven game development.

subProjects.title: Optimized Unity Scroll List
subProjects.description: High-performance scroll list implementation with object pooling.

projects.name: Unreal Engine Game Collection
projects.shortDescription: A collection of Unreal Engine projects showcasing multiplayer systems, combat mechanics, and modern C++ game development practices.
projects.description: A comprehensive portfolio of Unreal Engine projects demonstrating modern game development practices, including networked multiplayer, advanced combat systems, and level design.

subProjects.title: Battle Blaster
subProjects.description: Arena shooter with AI bots and multiplayer support.

subProjects.title: ShooterSam
subProjects.description: Cover-based tactical shooter with advanced AI behaviors.

subProjects.title: Dungeon Escape
subProjects.description: Third-person adventure prototype with combat and exploration.

projects.name: 3ashara Talwa
projects.shortDescription: Online multiplayer Backgammon game with strong AI, character customization, and multiple game modes.
projects.description: 3ashara Talwa is an online multiplayer game based on the rules of Backgammon popular in the Middle East. The game features two game modes 'ma7bosa' and 'therteen', strong AI opponents, character customization, and many more features.

projects.name: Estimation Kings
projects.shortDescription: Published four-player trick-taking card game available on Google Play Store.
projects.description: Are you a pro Estimation Player? If you are familiar with Tarneeb, Spades, Trix, Hearts and Balot, you will extremely enjoy playing Estimation. Estimation Kings is a four players trick-taking card game where only kings survive.

projects.name: Rhythm Attack VR
projects.shortDescription: Hyper-casual VR rhythm game - ITI graduation project with 100% original coding, art, music, and VFX.
projects.description: Rhythm Attack is a hyper-casual VR game where you defeat rhythm monsters by cutting the minions they throw at you until they get tired, then attack them with your gun to drain their health. Every time you fail to kill the enemy, he gets mad and level difficulty increases. This game was a graduation project from ITI game development diploma.

projects.name: VR Training Simulator
projects.shortDescription: Professional VR training application for industrial scenarios.
projects.description: A professional VR training application designed for industrial training scenarios. Provides immersive, hands-on training experiences in a safe virtual environment.

projects.name: VR Hackathon Project
projects.shortDescription: Award-winning VR experience developed during a hackathon event.
projects.description: An award-winning VR experience developed during a hackathon event, showcasing rapid prototyping and creative problem-solving in a time-constrained environment.

projects.name: Zinad Security Games
projects.shortDescription: Six serious games for security awareness training including Phishing Mania, Millionaire, and VR experiences.
projects.description: Zinad is a security solutions company that uses serious games to enhance employee security training. Developed 6 interactive games covering various security topics.

subProjects.title: Phishing Mania
subProjects.description: Game that teaches players how to identify phishing emails from real emails

subProjects.title: Who Will Be Millionaire
subProjects.description: Adaptation from the famous TV show focused on security field

subProjects.title: The Office VR
subProjects.description: Users eliminate clean desk policy violations before time runs out

subProjects.title: Password Ninja / URL Punk
subProjects.description: Users cut weak passwords and fake URLs to win

subProjects.title: Archery VR
subProjects.description: Users answer questions by throwing arrows at correct answers

projects.name: JS Native Game Engine
projects.shortDescription: Lightweight game engine built from scratch in vanilla JavaScript.
projects.description: A lightweight game engine demonstrating core concepts like the game loop, rendering, input handling, and entity management without external dependencies.

projects.name: WebGL Demo
projects.shortDescription: Interactive 3D graphics experiments using Three.js and WebGL.
projects.description: Interactive 3D graphics experiments using Three.js and WebGL. Demonstrates rendering techniques, shaders, and scene composition.

projects.name: Optimized Unity Scroll List
projects.shortDescription: Performance-optimized scroll list for Unity with object pooling and dynamic item recycling.
projects.description: A highly optimized scroll list implementation for Unity that uses object pooling and dynamic item recycling to handle large datasets efficiently. Perfect for mobile and desktop applications.

projects.name: CityVille Game Structure
projects.shortDescription: Modular game architecture framework for city-building games in Unity.
projects.description: A comprehensive game structure and architecture framework designed for city-building games. Features modular systems for resource management, building placement, and save/load functionality.
